Title: Children’s Star Wars R2D2 blue and white analogue watch RTD3206
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Children’s Star Wars R2D2 blue and white analogue watch RTD3206 RRP £19.99 Now £13.99 Description Children’s Star Wars analogue watch, featuring a print of the popular droid R2D2 upon the watch face. The watch has vibrant blue casing and a contrasting bright white strap, mirroring the colours of R2D2 itself. The watch casing also has two buttons upon the side, one to adjust the time upon the analogue display, and another that illuminates the multicoloured flashing lights set inside the watch. The numbers 12, 3, 6 and 9 are clearly marked in a silver tone, with circular notches representing the other hours on the analogue display. The watch hands are also in silver tone, contrasting against the image of R2D2 and ensuring they can be read. The white rubber strap is fastened by a secure blue buckle, and also features the printed name ‘R2D2’. We are authorised stockists of Disney and Star Wars watches. This product comes with a one year warranty from the manufacturer. Chapelle ref 08160081 Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP. We purchase at the best possible prices and pass on these savings to our customers. All our items are new and perfect goods; we do not sell seconds or second-hand items. We are authorised stockists of all the brands we sell so you can be confident you're buying from a reputable company.
